CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Retail Placement stage positioned above or below the In-Store Promotion stage?
SRP.A: The Retail Placement stage is positioned {above} the In-Store Promotion stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Launch in Market?
VE.A: The value of stage Launch in Market is {3395}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {2647}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {1229}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Product Concept, with a value of {4885}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Customer Purchase, with a value of {1229}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Product Concept to stage Taste Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {778} Thousand Bottles from stage Product Concept to stage Taste Testing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {712} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {662} Thousand Bottles from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 3021? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Product Concept} stage has {4885}, the {Taste Testing} stage has {4107}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {3395}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1560? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2269 and 3751? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {3395}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {2647}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to {Taste Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to {Retail Placement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing, or from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to stage {Taste Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Product Concept} and {Taste Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {In-Store Promotion} and {Customer Purchase} stages.
